text: This article is over 1 year old Julia Louis - Dreyfus tells Labor MP Graham Perrett to ‘ be careful ’ after mishap leaves him with black eye and stitches Veep stars respond to Australian MP who knocked himself out laughing at episode Writers and stars of Veep have responded incredulously to the news an Australian politician required stitches after knocking himself unconscious while laughing at the new season. Graham Perrett, a federal Labor MP in Queensland, was eating sushi while watching the US political satire on Sunday night when “ some of the rice went down the wrong way ”, causing him to fall and knock himself unconscious. Armando Iannucci on why he's glad he left Veep :'I don ’ t know how I ’ d respond to America now'Read more As
